greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n! * Sum_{k=0..n} (-1)^k * binomial(n,k) * n^(n - k) / k!.
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} (-1)^(n - k) * binomial(n,k)^2 * n^k * k!.
a(n) ~ sqrt(2*Pi) * BesselJ(0,2) * n^(2*n + 1/2) / exp(n). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Dec 18 2019
mathematica: Join[{1}, Table[n! Sum[(-1)^k Binomial[n, k] n^(n - k)/k!, {k, 0, n}], {n, 1, 15}]]
Table[n! SeriesCoefficient[Exp[-x/(1 - n x)]/(1 - n x), {x, 0, n}], {n, 0, 15}]
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Dec 18 2019
